ActCanadian Centre for Occupational Health and Safety Act
PrecisAppointment of ANDREA LEA PEART of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a governor of the Council of the Canadian Centre for Occupational Health and Safety, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
